name: Dead Monster In Space
description:
Dead Monster In Space is a bullet hell game where you need to kill some monster well in space but there's a twist. When a monster die , his healthbar become the enemy.

The player has some tricks to beat this horrible monster.

He can dash , he can slow down time when he doesn't move and he can shoot.

With the game , you can also download some custom WallPapers that are in the game to enhance your deskopt , these are of course optionnals

The game was made in 72hours for the Wowie GameJam
